name: Comet
description: Proud pillow carrier. Always hunting for the next sock. Enjoys long walks on the anywhere.

name: Minerva (Minnie)
description: Seeks warmth and scritches. Investigates interesting places. Hunts dangerous plants.

name: Fizzgig
description: The top dog. The little big brother. Keeps the house safe. Prevents any tomfoolery.

name: Oscar
description: Glares at intruders. Doesn't like company. Denizen of the Cat Cave.
